meanings.definition: To make effeminate or overly refined in character or manner.
meanings.sent1: He nancified his speech by using flowery language.
meanings.sent2: She always nancified her outfits with lace and ribbons.
meanings.sent3: The tough guy tried to nancify his appearance by wearing a pink bow tie.
meanings.sent4: Her elegant handwriting nancified the plain paper.
meanings.sent5: The artist nancified the painting with intricate details.

meanings.definition: To dress or behave in an excessively dainty or delicate manner.
meanings.sent1: The little girl nancified her walk by taking tiny steps.
meanings.sent2: He nancified his gestures by delicately sipping his tea.
meanings.sent3: The burly man decided to nancify his look by wearing a frilly apron.
meanings.sent4: Her room was nancified with pastel colors and fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent5: The garden was nancified with delicate flowers and fairy lights.
